item.title: Mendocino County Air Quality Management District Stationary Source Permits
item.description: The Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) is proposing action on four permitting rules submitted as a revision to the Mendocino County Air Quality Management District (“MCAQMD” or “the District”) portion of the applicable state implementation plan (SIP) for the State of California pursuant to req

item.title: Notice of Intent to Assess Administrative Penalty and Opportunity for Public Comment: The City of Wilkes Barre, Pennsylvania, CWA-03-2017-0017
item.description: EPA alleges that the respondent violated the Clean Water Act, specifically, the National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permit program, by failing to fully develop and implement properly a MS4 Program.

item.title: City of Havre de Grace, Maryland CWA-03-2017-0055
item.description: Notice of intent to assess administrative penalty and opportunity for public comment on Havre de Grace's Municipal Separate Storm Sewer System (Ms4) Facility.

item.title: General Permit Under the Federal Indian Country Minor NSR Program
item.description: The Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) previously provided notice of, and requested public comment on, the EPA's draft general permit for gasoline dispensing facilities for use in Indian country within California pursuant to the Clean Air Act (CAA) Federal Indian Country Minor New Source Revie

item.title: Proposed Permit for Leavenworth National Fish Hatchery in Washington
item.description: The Leavenworth National Fish Hatchery (LNFH) is part of a complex of three national fish hatcheries called the Leavenworth Fisheries Complex. The other two hatcheries that comprise the complex are the Entiat National Fish Hatchery and the Winthrop National Fish Hatchery.

item.title: Partial Approval/Partial Disapproval of Oregon 2012 303d List
item.description: EPA is partially approving and partially disapproving Oregon’s 2012 Impaired Waters List.

item.title: Proposed Permit for City of Genesee Wastewater Treatment Plant in Idaho
item.description: EPA proposes to reissue a National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permit to the City of Genesee in Idaho. The draft permit places conditions on the discharge of pollutants from the City of Genesee wastewater treatment plant to Cow Creek.

item.title: Ajo and Morenci Second 10-Year Sulfur Dioxide Maintenance Plans and Technical Correction
item.description: The Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) is approving the second 10-year maintenance plans for the Ajo and Morenci areas in Arizona for the 1971 National Ambient Air Quality Standards (NAAQS or “standards”) for sulfur dioxide (SO2), and correcting an error in the description of the Aj

item.title: Approval of Arizona Air Plan Revisions, Arizona Department of Environmental Quality and Pinal County Air Quality Control District
item.description: The Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) is proposing to approve revisions to the Arizona State Implementation Plan (SIP).

item.title: CWA-04-2016-4519(b) - Sonny Joe Sanders, TrueNorth Transport LLC
item.description: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, Region 4 proposes to issue a Consent Agreement and Final Order (CAFO) to TrueNorth Transport LLC, (Vessel Norfolk) Gig Harbor, Washington.

item.title: RCRA 7003 Administrative Order On Consent, (AOC) Cline Ave. Oil Spill Site, Gary, Indiana
item.description: EPA is seeking public comments on a proposed settlement agreement with OXY USA, Inc. EPA will not make a final decision on whether to enter the agreement until after considering public comments on the potential agreement.

item.title: Tentative Approval and Opportunity for Public Comment and Public Hearing for Public Water System Supervision Program Revision for West Virginia
item.description: The State of West Virginia is revising its approved Public Water System Supervision Program. West Virginia has adopted drinking water regulations for the Revised Total Coliform Rule. The U.S.

item.title: Last Call for Investigations & Cleanups at Libby Asbestos Superfund Site
item.description: EPA announces a final opportunity for owners of residential and commercial property in Libby and Troy, Montana to participate in the investigation and cleanup of Libby Amphibole asbestos.

item.title: KY17UIC003 - KenAmerican Resources, Inc.; Bremen, Kentucky
item.description: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, Region 4 intends to issue an Underground Injection Control (UIC) Class 5 permit under the authority of Title 40 the Code of Federal Regulations at Parts 124, 144, 146, and 147 to KenAmerican Resources, Inc.

item.title: EPA Decision to Add 72 Waterbody-Pollutant Combinations to North Carolina's 2016 Section 303(d) List
item.description: The EPA Region 4 is requesting public comment on its decision to add 72 waterbody-pollutant combinations to North Carolina’s 2016 303(d) list.
